body_html:
@Stonesjtu Hi may I know how you visualized the following in your reply?

I would really like to be able to use something like it to monitor my gpu usage in terms of what objects were taking up my memory. Thanks in advance.

body:
@Stonesjtu Hi may I know how you visualized the following in your reply?

I would really like to be able to use something like it to monitor my gpu usage in terms of what objects were taking up my memory. Thanks in advance. 


````
current memory use: 1.37623977661
                                              types |   # objects |   total size
=================================================== | =========== | ============
                                               dict |        2001 |    547.90 KB
     <class 'torch.autograd.function.ConcatBackward |        1000 |    234.38 KB
      <class 'torch.autograd.function.AddmmBackward |        1000 |    234.38 KB
  <class 'torch.autograd.function.TransposeBackward |        1000 |    234.38 KB
                                               list |        1153 |    115.91 KB
                                         torch.Size |        1000 |     70.31 KB
                                                int |        2038 |     47.77 KB
                                               long |        1000 |     27.34 KB
                                                str |         163 |      9.79 KB
                    <class 'psutil._pslinux.Process |           1 |     80     B
                                              float |           3 |     72     B
                             <class 'psutil.Process |           1 |     64     B
````
